SELECT bs.`dst_code` AS cameraCode , COUNT(DISTINCT bs.`src_ip`) AS clientCnt , COUNT(DISTINCT bs.`username`) AS userName ,SUM(bs.`count`) AS visitedCnt ,bc.`DEVICE_NAME` AS cameraName ,bc.ip_address AS cameraIp ,bc.`ID` AS cameraId ,br.name AS cameraRegion FROM busi_statistics bs LEFT JOIN busi_camera bc ON bc.`DEVICE_CODE` = bs.`dst_code` LEFT JOIN busi_region br ON bc.region = br.id WHERE bs.STAMP >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%y%m%d') AND bs.STAMP < DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%y%m%d')
and bs.action = #{action}
and (bs.action = 1 or bs.action =2)
GROUP BY bs.`dst_code`
order by visitedCnt asc
order by visitedCnt desc
limit #{size}

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT bs.`username`)AS USERNAME , COUNT(DISTINCT bs.dst_code) AS CAMERA_CNT, bs.`src_ip` AS CLIENT_IP , SUM(bs.`count`) AS VISIT_CNT FROM busi_statistics bs WHERE bs.STAMP >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%y%m%d') AND bs.STAMP < DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%y%m%d')
and bs.action = #{action}
and (bs.action = 1 or bs.action =2)
GROUP BY bs.`src_ip`
order by VISIT_CNT asc
order by VISIT_CNT desc
limit #{size}

SELECT bs.`username` AS USERNAME, COUNT(DISTINCT bs.`src_ip`) AS CLIENT_CNT , COUNT(DISTINCT bs.`dst_code`) AS CAMERA_ID, SUM(bs.`count`) AS VISIT_CNT FROM busi_statistics bs WHERE bs.STAMP >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%y%m%d') AND bs.STAMP < DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%y%m%d')
and bs.action = #{action}
and (bs.action = 1 or bs.action =2)
GROUP BY bs.`username`
order by VISIT_CNT asc
order by VISIT_CNT desc
limit #{size}

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT bs.`src_ip`) AS active , (SELECT COUNT(bct.`ip_address`) FROM `busi_client_terminal` bct WHERE DEVICE_TYPE = 6) AS count, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM busi_client_terminal b WHERE b.status = 1 and DEVICE_TYPE = 6) AS discovery FROM busi_statistics bs WHERE bs.stamp = DATE_FORMAT(#{date},'%y%m%d')

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT bs.username) AS active , (SELECT COUNT(bcl.username) FROM `busi_client_user` bcl ) AS count, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM busi_client_user b WHERE b.status = 1) AS discovery FROM busi_statistics bs WHERE bs.stamp = DATE_FORMAT(#{date},'%y%m%d')

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT bs.dst_code) AS active , (SELECT COUNT(bc.device_code) FROM `busi_camera` bc WHERE DEVICE_TYPE = 1) AS count, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM busi_camera b WHERE b.status = 1 and DEVICE_TYPE = 1) AS discovery FROM busi_statistics bs WHERE bs.stamp = DATE_FORMAT(#{date},'%y%m%d')
